data.title: New Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle movie
data.meta_description: Imagi Services President and CEO Tom Gray announces the signing of Kevin Munroe to write and direct a new CGI-animated feature-length Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles film. The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles will ramp-up their booming revival with an animated film that will take advantage of new…
data.text:
THEY ARE GOING TO RUIN IT.

Haha like that's possible.

for serious

That's 4 sure.

The franchise as a whole is already ruined, so whatever.

GO NINJA GO NINJA GO

"...that will take advantage of new technology developed since the last Turtles film"

i got money on bullet time and super-slowed down stupid fucking action scenes

- G

HAHAHA i loooove your icon!

God I hated those movies.

The cartoon rocked my face but the movies just made my teeth hurt, even when I was younger.

I ADORE TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES!

This movie had better be good

YO! it's the green machine--

gonna rock the town without bein' seen

have you ever seen a turtle Get Down?--

Slammin' Jammin' to the new swing sound

Yeah, everybody let's move--

Vanilla is here with the new Jack Groove

Gonna rock, and roll this place--

With the power of the ninja turtle bass

Iceman, ya know I'm not playin'--

Devastate the show while the turtles are sayin:

Ninja, Ninja, RAP! Ninja, Ninja, RAP! Ninja, Ninja, RAP!

GO GO GO GO

Go Ninja, Go Ninja, GO; Go Ninja, Go Ninja, GO!

Go Ninja, Go Ninja, GO; Go Ninja, Go Ninja, GO!

GO GO GO GO

Lyrics, fill in the gap--Drop that bass and get the NINJA RAP

Feel it, if you know what i mean--

Give it up, for the heroes in Green

Just flowin, smooth with the power, kickin it up, hour after

hour

Cause in this life there's only one winner--

You better aim straight so you can hit the center

In it to win, with a team of four--

Ninja Turtles that you gotta adore it's the:

Ninja, Ninja, RAP! Ninja, Ninja, RAP! Ninja, Ninja, RAP!

GO GO GO GO

Go Ninja, Go Ninja, GO; Go Ninja, Go Ninja, GO!

Go Ninja, Go Ninja, GO; Go Ninja, Go Ninja, GO!

GO GO GO GO

Villians you better run and hide--

Because one day you might not slide

So Choose your weapon but don't slip--

Vanilla's in control with the flex of the mic grip

Rockin' the crowd the way it should be rocked--

With the Miami drop that you like alot

You know, its Hittin' like a Ninja Turtle when the bass kicks

in--

You better check your level

The power of the Ninja is strong--

Fightin' all the crooks until they're all cold gone.

Ninja, Ninja, RAP! Ninja, Ninja, RAP! Ninja, Ninja, RAP!

GO GO GO GO

Go Ninja, Go Ninja, GO; Go Ninja, Go Ninja, GO!

Go Ninja, Go Ninja, GO; Go Ninja, Go Ninja, GO!

GO GO GO GO

ahahahahaha

hahahahaha

Love the icon.

I've been watching all the reruns of My So Called Life on the family channel.

(no subject) - loveamasochist Expand

Hahahaha, everytime my sister and I see each other one of us says, "Yo!" and the other picks up with the "It's the green machine!" and it goes on forever. Man, I love that movie, and Secret of the Ooze April was definitely the best April out of all of them.

T-U-R-T-L-E POWER!

(some co-workers and i were singing the go ninja song hte other day at work. it's funny how the words come back to you as if you heard it just yesterday)

You are SHITTING me.

Okay crappy things to happen this week:

Mitch Hedberg dead

Pope will be dead soon

Honeymooners movie

NOW A NINJA TURTLE MOVIE.

The apocalypse is coming.

honestly...*Sob*

I am seriously crushed about Mitch Hedberg..and The Honeymooners. Oh and the Pope.

Some one is having an evil laugh at all of our expenses!

(no subject) - me_and_jimmy Expand

(no subject) - youcurseatgirls Expand

(no subject) - oraclegem Expand

Mitch Hedberg is dead?! FUCK!

Are writers/directors/producers getting this lazy they cant even come up with their own fucking stories?

seriously, this is pathetic.

my boyfriend will probably love this, ahaha.

hahah so will mine.

I refuse to see this fucking movie, I love the original (excluding the third one cuz WTH?) I love the first two movies they were great and its such a part of my child hood and I'm sure most of the people in this community can say that too. I liked the men in costumes LOL but this new idea sounds HORRIBLE ugh...

agreed.

I lived on an air force base when one of the movies came out and they had ppl dressed up like them come and visit. The only thing I remember is that one of the guys sat in a chair and the chair got stuck to his ass b/c of the shell part of his costume.

Your icon made me laugh hysterically.

LMAO oh my god hahaha *coughing from laughing hard* hahaha

oh man that mental image...okay so it's not that funny but its late and I'm a little odd right now...

BEST ICON EVER.

you beat me to it. by a lot, but still. I was working!

The girl from VH1's totally obsessed...will be thrilled.

i don't know why that just popped into my head.

man, the new TMNT sucks ass.

I used to LOVE TMNT back in the 80's, and I loved the first and second movies (even as a kid I couldn't get into the third) but I don't know about this. I hope they don't fuck it up and I hope the Turtles look more like they did back in the 80's instead of how they look now, demonic and pupil-less.

(no subject) - (Anonymous)
